PackageOracle.name: DA_PARTY_ADDRESS
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PARTY_ADDRESS
/* Generated on 01-JUL-15 01.09.06.481664000 AM -05:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,address_id IN NUMBER
,address_usage_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,address_id IN NUMBER
,address_usage_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_party_address;

body.name: DA_PARTY_ADDRESS
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PARTY_ADDRESS
/* Generated on 01-JUL-15 01.09.06.508290000 AM -05:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,address_id IN NUMBER
,address_usage_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_party_address.add, parms=' || party_id || '|' || address_id || '|' || address_usage_type_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_party_address a
(
a.party_id
,a.address_id
,a.address_usage_type_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.party_id
,add.address_id
,add.address_usage_type_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_party_address.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,party_id IN NUMBER
,address_id IN NUMBER
,address_usage_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_party_address.del, parms=' || party_id || '|' || address_id || '|' || address_usage_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_party_address a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.party_id = del.party_id
AND a.address_id = del.address_id
AND a.address_usage_type_cd = del.address_usage_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_party_address.del');

END del;

END da_party_address;
